channel.title: Info on Caches?
channel.description: so instead of throwing out this client because it doesnt come with a cache i have decided im not gonna take the lazy way out and i will actually learn how to make one. So with that being said, what exactly needs to go in a cache database? are there any good guides out there to follow? but mainly what do i need to have in my cache database? Thank you for all input! :) :) :cool: ;D

item.title: Info on Caches?
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

im not 100% sure, but, yes i think so. although they DO delete files if they arent accessed for 30 days or somethingâ€¦just keep that in mind.

item.title: Info on Caches?
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

saltywalrus:

so instead of throwing out this client because it doesnt come with a cache i have decided im not gonna take the lazy way out and i will actually learn how to make one. So with that being said, what exactly needs to go in a cache database? are there any good guides out there to follow? but mainly what do i need to have in my cache database? Thank you for all input! ;D

well seeing as it contains all the images and models for the RSPS, you might NOT want to make your own. :). just look up 317 Cache download. and download it. all cache is ALMOST compatable with EVERY client if you do it right.

Read full topic
